Internships allow for exploration, development of skills, growing your network, and gaining hands-on industry experience. Employers say that the top reason they’ll hire you over another similar candidate is because of internship experience. CU Boulder provides exceptional resources for finding internships and professional development because we want you to succeed here and in your professional careers.
